This is an Extension for fetching videos from vimeo.com and vidtags.com by injecting download buttons directly into the Vimeo or VidTags player.
Video Import app for Vimeo and VidTags extension which allows injecting download buttons directly into these players and thereafter allows you to fetch videos from these 2 platforms to VI app
The main concepts of Video Import app for Vimeo and VidTags extension are:
- provide injection only on user demand
- minimal resource consumption
- minimal permissions request
 
NOTE: 
â€’ This extension is not affiliated with Vimeo or VidTags.
 
 
VidPowr Features;
Create interactive videos
Create shoppable videos
Add CTAs to your videos
Collect leads inside your video
Create conditional videos
Player customizations
Create multilanguage videos
Video captions and subtitles
Video protection and security
Create quizzes/Polls
Add clickable buttons
Add hotspots
Embed your videos on your website and third-party sites
Create video pages and playlists
